GUI-based design: <ref>Using the wxSmith plug-in (included in distribution  requires wxWidgets SDK)</ref>
Latest stable release: 2017-12<ref>codeblocks.org / Also provides relatively stable "nightly builds"  an alternative to the official releases</ref>

GUI-based design: <ref>Using the wxCrafter plug-in (included in distribution  requires wxWidgets SDK)</ref>

Linux: <ref>A Linux version was in the works  but has been abandoned since mid-2002; however  Dev-C++ has been reported to run on Wine.</ref>

Mac OS 7 (v2.x-v4.x only)  Linux<ref name="VisualGDB">Linux is support for Visual Studio C/C++ is available via third-party plugin VisualGDB http://www.visualgdb.com/</ref>
Refactoring: (also plugin)<ref name="Visual Assist X and Resharper C++">Refactoring for Visual Studio C/C++ is supported natively since Visual Studio 2015 and via third-party plugins Visual Assist X http://www.wholetomato.com/ and Resharper for C++ https://www.jetbrains.com/resharper-cpp/</ref>
